availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel A. Kelley (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p:
Born in 1827. Married to Martha J. Children included Mary E. and Martha J.
Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on August 6, 1861, as a Sergeant. Promoted 1st Lieutenant, December 2, 1862. Promoted Captain August 12, 1863. Captured at Rockford, Tennessee, November 14, 1863.

bibl.p: Sergeant E. Tarrant, The Wild Riders of the First Kentucky Cavalry : a History of the Regiment, in the Great War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865 : Pathetic Scenes, Amusing Incidents, and Thrilling Episodes, a Regimental Roster, Prison Life, Adventures, and Escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 418; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Station Camp, citing family p, 24, family 169, NARA microfilm publication M593 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, n.d.); FHL microfilm 545,958.
